mage paththen gaththoth mama wadipurama kamathi oya anthimata thiyana pada tikata.mokada api aadaraya kiyanne mokakda kiyala dahadenekgen ahuwoth labenne uththara dahayak..samaharunta aadaraya kiyanne mokakda kiyala ahuwama denna uththarayak naha...ithin ehema eke aadaraya gana hariyatama nirwachanayak denna puluwan kiyala mata nam hithenna.pasal yana kale bandunu premayath ekka ee dawaswala hithan unne aadaraya kiyanne eekata kiyala...eeth ada wenakota thama hithenne ethana thiyenna aththe aadaraya nemeyi aakarshanaya witharayi kiyala...habayi pasukalinawa ee thathwe wenas una kiyalath welawakata hithenawa...

shri lanka nidahas pakshaye jyeshta anushasaka hitapu janadhipathini chandrika bandaranayaka mahathmiya, hitapu agamathi di mu jayarathna mahatha, pakshaye mahalekam duminda disanayaka, eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye maha lekam mahinda amarawira, pakshaye jyeshta upa sabhapathiwarun, jyeshta upalekamwarun, aandukarawarun, maha amathiwarun, deshapalana paksha nayakayan, aasana sanwidhayakayan athulu wishala pirisakage sahabhagithwayen pawathi 66 wani sanwathsaraya paswaru 2.35ta pamana aarambha wiya.
